Articles.Content:
Hey all,

I'm having an issue where crafts in space and atmosphere free bodies are not being lit by kerbol. This doesn't seem to be an issue on Kerbin, where day/night cycles appear to be working fine, but the Mun is just as dark during the day as at night. I can play with the vacuum ambient light turned up to see, but it doesn't look great that way. Has anybody seen this issue before? I've searched these forums and Google but nothing turned up. 

I can post my full mod list once I get home, just thought I'd check if someone knew what causes this off the top of their head. I am playing with Kerbol Star Systems with up-to-date Kopernicus and I had scatterer/eve/planetshine installed until I removed them to try and troubleshoot. 

Cheers!

Edit: The solution was found, the problem was due to the new Kopernicus update not being fully compatible with KSS.

Edited December 3, 2017 by Lifeisgreasy
